longMSG:
You are in the attic on the 3rd floor. It is very dark and dusty. 
 There is a chest and a dollHouse.
 You may go down the ladder to the master bedroom.
shortMSG:
You are in the attic on the 3rd floor. 
 Features: chest, dollHouse 
 Areas you may go to: down - ladder to master bedroom  - 2nd floor
